attributes.review: Hello. I am here to tell the story of my experience with this app. So I got in the first place hoping it would teach me how to walk my fish. Little did I know I was in for a whole WEEK of trouble. The first day I opened the app it showed me a HORRIBLE picture of this UGLY crusty and overall BLINDING old Cheeto and me and my youngest daughter blind after we saw this picture and heard a LOUD ringing in our ear that made us deaf after we looked at the picture. All I could hear was “VOTE TRUMP 2020” I’m a very ugly old voice. I yelled STOP which scared my husband. My husband rushed into the room grabbed my daughter and left me all alone. After my husband left I still heard the voices in my head and felt like I was about to puke. Then.. suddenly I puked out my large intestine and my dog ate it happily so I wasn’t too mad. Then the voice stopped! I was so relived and went to sleep. Then I woke up in the morning feeling like I was about to puke again but I didn’t. So I went and looked at the camera Footage and I noticed that some tall orange figure had walked into my room and wrote trump 2020 on my walls! I was so scared that I screamed loud but he came up behind me and he said “shhh vote trump 2020 and this will all end.” Then he vanished! I was so FLABBERGASTED that I was at a loss of words but then I noticed that I couldn’t find my dog so I started crying. Then I had a bad feeling in my stomach and I puked.. I puked up MY DOG! I was so sad but he was STILL ALIVE! I was so happy after that! After my husband and my five daughters and six sons left with my husband I needed my dog and my hamster and 2 rats. Then my husband came back and said he didn’t think that his pets should be around a psychopath then I got put into a mental hospital while I told them multiple times that he was following us but they didn’t listen. I even told them how mentally stable I was before I got the app. Then one of the nurses got the app to prove I was crazy. Then he came for her as well and she puked up her large intestine but her kids also got the app so all her 27 kids puked up their large intestines and their dog age them all. And the kids said all they heard was “come to my van the TRUMP VAN.” so then 7 of her kids went to the van and came back saying as soon as they went in the van they got tired and fell asleep but when they woke up they had sore butts and sticky stuff that tasted like cherry’s on them and the mom started crying because she knew what he did to them. Then her and her husband chased after the van and then she finally caught up to the van she found out it was a puppet driving the van. Then she started smashing The puppet with her bare hand then the puppet bit her and she died. And suddenly she started turning orange. Her hair turned blonde and she walked out saying trump 2020 nonstop and so did her husband. Let me remind u it’s only been 4 days since I got the app and all this happened and they still haven’t told me how to walk my fish.. my poor fish needs to get his cardio in and they won’t tell us🥺my fish is already starting to get fat cause he sits in the couch all day watching golf then my whole family comes back and the puppet bites them and they all start turning orange shouting trump 2020 so then I went back to the app and checked the notifications and heard a loud ringing in my ear so I started crying again and puked out my butthole. Then passed out for 2 days and deleted the app as soon as I woke up and while I’m writing this I’m still stuck in this metal hospital because they caught me after I escaped through the toilet. and that’s the end of my story if you finished in your a G anyway BYE SEND GET WELL CARDS, also I don’t advise you to get this app or u could have a similar outcome like me.

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see the one and only Donald, when the app finally downloaded I got to see him. But it was asking me to give my phone number to login, I already believe that COVID is just a hoax to make it so they can put new batteries in the birds. So I wasn’t sure if I wanted to do that. But then I finally said, “even if my phone gets a bunch of viruses, it’s all worth it to see my favorite Donald,” so I put in my number. I’ve probably gotten 50 messages from a guy named Taylor asking for my nudes, saying Donald wants them. I would send them but I don’t trust Taylor, sorry Donald.
attributes.title: I’m scared
